mapper.update: UPDATE marketRating SET rating = #{rating}, writer = #{writer}, date = now(), content = #{content} WHERE market_seq = #{market_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, d.profile FROM (SELECT b.*, a.product_name, a.nickname FROM (SELECT * FROM marketboard) AS a JOIN (SELECT * FROM marketrating) AS b ON a.market_seq = b.market_seq WHERE a.nickname = #{nickname}) AS c JOIN (SELECT nickname, profile FROM member) AS d ON c.writer = d.nickname ORDER BY date DESC;
